item.title: Create a Blog With Hugo and Github
item.description: Reference This post is based on the following Youtube tutorial. Prerequisites on Github Create a public respository blog_code for storing the code. Create an another public repository mygithubname.github.io to deploy (publish) the site. This one must have the same name as the Github username. Open a shell on your dev environment Clone the blog_code respository. 1 2 git clone git@github.com:isibox/blog_code.git Go to the blog_code folder.
